question: What is the average age of frequent flyers in each membership level?
query:
SELECT f.level,
       AVG(p.age) AS average_age
FROM postgres_air.frequent_flyer f
JOIN postgres_air.account a ON a.frequent_flyer_id = f.frequent_flyer_id
JOIN postgres_air.passenger p ON p.account_id = a.account_id
GROUP BY f.level;
